name: Shaft!
description:
Game jam game made by Jordan Funk and Jessica St-Pierre. This was created within 48 hours.

"Shaft!" is a light puzzle game in the vein of Tetris about stacking as many rocks as possible on a mine cart and pushing it through a small hole at the end of the tracks within a specific time limit. 

If the player manages to get the cart through the hole by the end of the timer, the players score is calculated based on how many rocks and what type of rocks successfully stayed on the cart.
